official_title: A bill to modify the deadlines applicable to hazardous waste disposal facilities required to certify compliance with certain financial responsibility requirements under the Solid Waste Disposal Act.
subjects: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages

summary.text: Extends for two years the compliance date for certain financial responsibility requirements under the Solid Waste Disposal Act for hazardous waste disposal facilities.

titles.title: A bill to modify the deadlines applicable to hazardous waste disposal facilities required to certify compliance with certain financial responsibility requirements under the Solid Waste Disposal Act.
